segments.text: I see the little girl reaching up for a cookie, her hand open and hopeful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so innocent, just waiting for her brother to share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she knows how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool, and it’s clearly about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water on the floor makes everything even more dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe their mother hasn’t noticed any of this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems so trusting, like she doesn’t see the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would help them before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels like it’s about to go wrong at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
